backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining e‑commerce types, storage maps, vendor tracking, and authorization helpers including profile retrieval and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding, logo, and PWA asset update requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their UI and styling behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root variables and theme definitions for light/dark modes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with QuickBazar branding, manifest links, meta tags, and root mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining QuickBazar name, icons, colors, categories, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient branding and retry link.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first or cache-first strategies with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the main TanStack router with routes for public pages, customer, vendor, and admin sections, wrapping everything in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the global page layout with top and bottom navigation and a styled main content area.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with guidance and links to home or support.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal for authenticated users without a profile to submit name and contact info.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards child components based on required user roles and displays access-denied states when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar that adapts links based on user role and shows cart count badges.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wraps the base Button with a primary gradient CTA style.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a product deal card with image, pricing, discount info, and an optional ribbon, linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Implements an input with floating label behavior using Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Implements an auto-rotating banner slider with manual navigation buttons and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive product grid with loading skeletons, pricing, discounts, stock badges, and add-to-cart support.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Displays an order status badge styled via helper functions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with search, logo, role‑based actions, cart badge, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Exports a static list of sample vendor entries with basic shop details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, exposing identity, login, logout, and login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, roles, vendors, products, and other backend-driven data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers plus custom color variables, themes, shadows, and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature cards explaining platform benefits. Mostly static UI with icons and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin analytics including product, order, vendor counts, revenue, and a bar chart overview.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders with status, customer info, totals, and allows admins to update order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product management for admins including listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Provides an admin interface to list, add, and remove vendors, including a dialog form for creating new vendor entries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, handles quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to checkout. Computes pricing with discounts and manages signed-in state.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all categories with images and color accents, showing skeletons while loading. Each category links to its dedicated listing page.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products filtered by a category and supports sorting by name, price, or discount. Uses memoized filtering and displays a product grid.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from the cart, calculates totals, and submits a new order while clearing the cart. Requires sign-in and handles processing state and errors.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and mock submission along with contact info cards. Manages form state and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Displays the logged‑in customer's profile and role, showing principal ID and stored personal details in read‑only form.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Fetches and displays the customer's orders with status, totals, and timestamps, showing an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Shows the user's wishlist by matching stored product IDs with product data, rendering product cards or loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero slider, login buttons, featured deals from the first four products, and a features section.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Implements a customer login/onboarding form with validation and saves the data before navigating to the vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects outlet details and photo for vendor onboarding with validation, saving the data and navigating to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a vendor dashboard with registration confirmation and detailed outlet info using stored onboarding data, redirecting to login if missing.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Displays vendors filtered by city with navigation to vendor shops, or empty states when no city or vendors are found.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Implements a vendor login form with validation, saving data to onboarding storage and navigating to outlet details on success.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Shows detailed info for a selected vendor shop using vendorId, with back navigation and a not-found state.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with image carousel, pricing, reviews, and allows adding to cart and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Renders the main vendor dashboard with stats, products, orders, wallet due, and payment handling for re-enabling disabled outlets.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Lists vendor orders with status, timestamps, and basic order info, showing loading and empty states as needed.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Vendor UI for listing, adding, editing and deleting products with dialog-based form and query hooks.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Deterministically maps category IDs to gradient color classes using a hash.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Provides case-insensitive lookup of a category by name.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats bigint or number values into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving and clearing onboarding data in sessionStorage for customers, vendors and outlets.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order/UI statuses and stock levels to human‑readable text and Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, radius, shadows, animations and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features and versions for the marketplace app.
